Articles.Content:
I've recently been wondering where the file is for the Kerbal model is and their helmet as I'm sure that if you can remove the helmet then they are separate models and such could be modded to have a different helmet. either something Russian or shuttle inspired.

 

I might need some help with coding and porting and dependencies. But I can handle the modeling and texturing.
Welcome to the forums,you might look at this mod for additional information:
yes, but that that is for texture alone as well as being outdated. not the 3d model / mesh.
